contentrichtext.text: The '''LDAP Application Program Interface''', described by '''RFC 1823''', is an Informational [[Request for Comments|RFC]] that specifies an [[application programming interface]] in the [[C (programming language)|C programming language]] for version 2 of the [[Lightweight Directory Access Protocol]]. Version 2 of LDAP is historic. Commonly available LDAP C APIs do not strictly adhere to this specification. ==External links== *RFC 1823 - The LDAP Application Program Interface - IETF [[Category:C libraries]] {{compu-lang-stub}}
